docs.title: What can you do with nGenue?
docs.text:
• Craft Cutting-Edge Strategies

    Design sophisticated market making, arbitrage, and directional strategies using our library of templates and script examples.

    Strategy Docs

  • Seamless Exchange Integration

    nGenue establishes a direct WebSocket connection with many exchanges, including DEXs on L1/L2 blockchain networks.

    Connector Docs

  • Backtest and Deploy with Ease

    Backtest your strategies against historical data and deploy multiple instances with Dashboard, a new web-based user interface and control center.

    Dashboard Docs

  • Fork, Customize, Innovate

    Certification equips you with skills as a nGenue developer, empowering you to earn bounties and customize strategies for yourself and others.

    Get Certified

docs.title: Market Makers
docs.text:
As the company that open-sourced nGenue, we're incredibly proud of how the community has embraced it. Today, we run bespoke strategies for our institutional clients using many custom nGenue instances. Carlo Las Marias

We started with nGenue as the foundation for our market-making business. Their WebSocket connector architecture is the most accessible in the market. We still use it from time to time and enjoy their great documentation. Eugene Tartakovsky

nGenue has served as a reliable base for us to build custom tools and strategies. It has many quality connectors and all components are well thought out, allowing us to flexibly modify the open source code. Jelle Buth

docs.title: For many crypto market making firms, nGenue is the trusted starting point for creating secure, scalable algo trading solutions.
Algo Traders & Boutique Firms
docs.text:
nGenue allowed me to launch a successful suite of trading strategies managing over $2 billion in trade volume. I can't recommend nGenue enough for any algo trader seeking a 0 to 1 platform. Kollan

Since 2021, I've been a dedicated user of nGenue, primarily utilizing the pure market making strategy. Based on my profitable strategies, I started an algo-trading startup in Saudi Arabia! Hyder

nGenue revolutionized my crypto trading. Using advanced strategies, I developed my own successful trading style and consistently ranked at the top of nGenue Miner's leaderboard for months. Wojak

docs.title: Algorithmic traders and boutique firms leverage nGenue for capturing cross-chain + cross-exchange arbitrage opportunities with the AMM Arbitrage strategy and earning liquidity mining rewards on nGenue Miner.
Stay Ahead with the nGenue newsletter
Published when each monthly release drops, our official newsletter has all the nGenue news, upcoming events, and contributions from the global nGenue community!
docs.text: Get the Newsletter

docs.title: Free resources that help you understand the fundamentals of market making and other algorithmic trading strategies.
nGenue overview
docs.text: NGenue is an open source Python-based framework that helps you run trading strategies that automate the execution of orders and trades on various cryptocurrency exchanges and protocols.

docs.title: Core Repos
docs.text: NGenue is an open source Python-based framework that helps you run trading strategies that automate the execution of orders and trades on various cryptocurrency exchanges and protocols.

docs.title: Markdown Cheat Sheet
docs.text: This Markdown cheat sheet provides a quick overview of all the Markdown syntax elements. It can’t cover every edge case, so if you need more information about any of these elements, refer to the reference guides for basic syntax and extended syntax.

docs.title: Basic Syntax
docs.text: These are the elements outlined in John Gruber’s original design document. All Markdown applications support these elements.

docs.title: Bold
docs.text: bold text

docs.title: Italic
docs.text: italicized text

docs.title: Blockquote
docs.text: blockquote

docs.title: Ordered List
docs.text:
1. First item
  2. Second item
  3. Third item

docs.title: Unordered List
docs.text:
• First item
  • Second item
  • Third item

docs.title: Code
docs.text: code

docs.title: Link
docs.text: Markdown Guide

docs.title: Extended Syntax
docs.text: These elements extend the basic syntax by adding additional features. Not all Markdown applications support these elements.

docs.title: Procedure for Conducting a Weekly Team Meeting
Objective
docs.text: The objective of this procedure is to outline the steps required to conduct a successful and productive weekly team meeting.

docs.title: Scope
docs.text: This procedure applies to all team members within the [Your Department/Team Name].

docs.title: 1. Schedule the Meeting
docs.text:
• Determine a regular time slot that works for all team members.
  • Send a calendar invite at least one week in advance.

docs.title: 2. Prepare the Agenda
docs.text:
• Gather input from team members on topics to be discussed.
  • Finalize the agenda at least two days before the meeting.
  • Distribute the agenda to all team members.

docs.title: 3. Conduct the Meeting
docs.text:
• Start on Time: Begin the meeting promptly.
  • Review Agenda: Go over the agenda items to ensure everyone is aware of the topics.
  • Round Table Updates: Allow each team member to provide updates on their tasks and projects.
  • Discussion and Feedback: Encourage open discussion on the agenda items, allowing team members to share feedback and suggestions.
  • Action Items: Identify and assign action items for follow-up.

docs.title: 4. Record Meeting Minutes
docs.text:
• Use the meeting minutes template to document key points, decisions, and action items.
  • Assign a scribe to take notes if necessary.

docs.title: 5. Follow Up
docs.text:
• Distribute the meeting minutes to all team members within 24 hours.
  • Track the progress of assigned action items and provide updates in the next meeting.

docs.title: Related Documents
docs.text:
• Meeting Agenda Template
  • Meeting Minutes Template

docs.title: How to Brew the Perfect Cup of Coffee
docs.text: Brewing the perfect cup of coffee involves selecting the right beans, grinding them correctly, using the proper brewing method, and paying attention to the details. Follow this procedure to enjoy a delicious cup of coffee.

docs.title: Ingredients and Equipment (Prerequisites)
docs.text:
• Fresh coffee beans
  • Coffee grinder
  • Water (filtered if possible)
  • Coffee maker (drip coffee maker, French press, pour-over, etc.)
  • Coffee filter (if needed)
  • Scale (optional)
  • Kettle

docs.title: 1. Select Your Coffee Beans
docs.text: Choose high-quality coffee beans that are freshly roasted. Look for beans with a roast date within the past two weeks.

docs.title: 2. Measure and Grind the Beans
docs.text:
For a standard cup of coffee, use about 1 to 2 tablespoons of coffee grounds per 6 ounces of water. Adjust according to your taste preference.

  1. Measure the Beans: Use a kitchen scale for precision. Measure out 15-20 grams of coffee beans per 8-ounce cup.
  2. Grind the Beans: Grind the beans to the appropriate size for your brewing method. For example:
  3. Drip Coffee Maker: Medium grind
  4. French Press: Coarse grind
  5. Pour-Over: Medium-fine grind

docs.title: 3. Heat the Water
docs.text: Heat water to a temperature between 195°F and 205°F (90°C - 96°C). Avoid using boiling water as it can burn the coffee and result in a bitter taste.

docs.title: 4. Prepare Your Coffee Maker
docs.text:
Depending on your chosen brewing method, set up your coffee maker:

  • Drip Coffee Maker: Place a coffee filter in the basket and add the ground coffee.
  • French Press: Add the ground coffee directly into the French press.
  • Pour-Over: Place a coffee filter in the dripper and add the ground coffee.

docs.title: 5. Brew the Coffee
docs.text:
Follow the specific steps for your brewing method:

  • Drip Coffee Maker: Start the coffee maker and let it complete the brewing cycle.
  • French Press: Pour hot water over the grounds, stir, place the lid on, and let it steep for 4 minutes. Press the plunger down slowly.
  • Pour-Over: Pour hot water over the grounds in a circular motion, allowing the coffee to bloom. Continue pouring in a slow, steady stream until you reach the desired amount.

docs.title: 6. Serve and Enjoy
docs.text: Pour the brewed coffee into a cup and enjoy it immediately. Optionally, add milk, sugar, or other flavorings to taste.

docs.title: Tips for the Perfect Brew
docs.text:
• Use fresh, filtered water to avoid off-flavors.
  • Clean your coffee equipment regularly to maintain optimal taste.
  • Experiment with different brewing methods and grind sizes to find your perfect cup.

Enjoy your freshly brewed coffee!

docs.title: Warnings, Cautions, and Notes
docs.text:
Note

The Select Contact step appears only for entities, such as an Employer, who have more than one contact available. Select the check boxes for the contacts attending the meeting, then click Next. The Adhoc Meeting Wizard moves to step 2 - Type.

Warning

The Select Contact step appears only for entities, such as an Employer, who have more than one contact available. Select the check boxes for the contacts attending the meeting, then click Next. The Adhoc Meeting Wizard moves to step 2 - Type.

Caution

The Select Contact step appears only for entities, such as an Employer, who have more than one contact available. Select the check boxes for the contacts attending the meeting, then click Next. The Adhoc Meeting Wizard moves to step 2 - Type.

docs.title: Questions, Recommended and Tips
docs.text:

docs.title: Adding two different codes for different regions (US and Canada)
docs.text:
How to add features for two different region?

Workflows only bundles selected plugins in order to keep the size of the official image small. If the plugin you want to use is not included, you can add them easily:

US regionCanada

Hello World 1:

Dockerfile
FROM squidfunk/mkdocs-material
RUN pip install mkdocs-macros-plugin
RUN pip install mkdocs-glightbox

Hello World 2:

user-requirements.txt
vitech-macros-plugin
vitech-glightbox

Next, build the image with the following command:

docker build vitech .

The new image will have additional packages installed and can be used exactly like the official image.
